review: Great game, however it feels like an expansion to Airland Battle rather than a sequel. Although it is a fantastic strategy game I am not convinced it is worth the full $40 USD as it is essentially the same as Airland Battle just with navy warfare and a few extra countries.
Excellent game highly addictive and the mods are fantastic, any RPG fans would love this game
